title: october 23: hello, it’s me….the ipod (with Noah Kahan)
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the humble beginnings of the little rectangle from which we listen to songs. She says goodbye with a musical fact about Adele’s song Hello. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms. Distributed by Talkhouse. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
